amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike provisions which waive a fine for a first time paperwork violation and require that agencies establish a policy for eliminating, delaying, or reducing fines in appropriate circumstances.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to strike provisions that waive fines for a first time violation and establishes a policy for agencies, except the IRS, to eliminate or reduce fines in certain circumstances and to take into account seriousness of violation, health and safety, consumer and worker protections, the environment and compliance history.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 214 (Roll no. 19).
